org.apache.openjpa.util
Class ProxyCollections

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.openjpa.util.Proxies
      org.apache.openjpa.util.ProxyCollections

public class ProxyCollections
extends Proxies

Utility methods used by collection proxies.

Author:
Abe White
